name: Vladislav Delay
description: '''Sasu Ripatti''' (born 1976), better known by the [[pseudonym]] '''Vladislav Delay''', is a Finnish [[electronic music]]ian. He has also recorded as '''Luomo''', '''Sistol''', '''Uusitalo,''' '''Conoco,''' and '''Ripatti''', working in styles such as [[minimal techno]], [[glitch music|glitch]], and [[house music|house]].
